definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱

sentences.english: Fully populated each Barge drive bay contains 96 drives.
sentences.chinese: 完全稀疏的每只平底船开湾包括96个驱动器。

sentences.english: A disk drive system and method capable of dynamically allocating data is provided.
sentences.chinese: 提供了能够动态分配数据的磁盘驱动器系统和方法。

sentences.english: Incremental encoders without bearings for drives with large axial play or high speeds.
sentences.chinese: 无轴承的驱动器增量式编码器与大型轴向或高速行驶。

sentences.english: Please verify that the diskette with the file is in the correct drive.
sentences.chinese: 请检查包含该文件的磁盘是否在正确的驱动器上。

sentences.english: Each of the drives is named as a physical volume.
sentences.chinese: 每个驱动器作为一个物理卷进行命名。

sentences.english: HAS performed the maximum number of drive cleanings.
sentences.chinese: 清洗器墨盒已进行了最大次数的驱动器清洗。

sentences.english: Can not save to a network drive or a floppy disk.
sentences.chinese: 无法将它们玻存到一滚硒妈驱动器或踊个软盘。

sentences.english: It accepts hard drives up to one inch thick, and offers multiple safety features.
sentences.chinese: 该破坏机能绞碎厚达一英尺的硬盘驱动器。

sentences.english: The disk controller was chomping all day yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 磁盘驱动器昨天坏了一整天。

sentences.english: So what do I need to have differential drive?
sentences.chinese: 要制作一个差分驱动器我需要有什么呢？

sentences.english: A high power line driver comes standard.
sentences.chinese: 高功率线驱动器成为标准配备。

sentences.english: The first partition on the primary drive will be sda1, for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如，主驱动器上的第一个分区是sda1。

sentences.english: No ballasts, cooling fans or effectors needed. LED lights use standard light bulb sockets.
sentences.chinese: 不需要驱动器或冷却风扇标准的电源插座接头。

sentences.english: These priorities are set using a small set of pins at the rear of the drive called jumpers.
sentences.chinese: 通过使用驱动器背部的一套小针来设定这些特性。

sentences.english: Map all shared directories against the shared drives.
sentences.chinese: 根据共享驱动器映射所有的共享目录。

definition: CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱
drive letter (letter assigned to a disk drive or partition) (computing)
CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
magnetic head (of a tape recorder etc)
